entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 13
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS 15 TO 20

entry.em: MARTIN LUTHER KING JR DAY AND MONDAY NIGHT
entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR

LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY

MOSTLY CLOUDY
